root.name: Seireisenshi Spriggan
root.description: OverviewSeireisenshi Spriggan is a vertical scrolling shooter for the PC Engine CD.It was developed by Compile and published by Naxat Soft in 1991.The gameplay of Spriggan is much like most vertical scrolling shoot em' ups of the era. However the game features an orb system. The player can mix and match up to 3 different colored orbs (Red, Yellow, Blue, Green). Each combination creates drastically varying shot types.Many fans of the game compare it to another Compile developed game, M.U.S.H.A. for the Sega Genesis. Both games have a similar art style, and a similar feel.
